resources.string: Could not retrieve entries.\n Please try again later.
Please change tags or try later.
Tap here to register hatena user name.
If you can send crash log, please enable this option.

Follow user api is not provided, so to follow a user, visit http://b.hatena.ne.jp/USERNAME and click \'お気に入りに追加\'.\n For example, visit http://b.hatena.ne.jp/YasuOza and you can find \'お気に入りに追加\'. Make sure you logged into Hatena bookmark.
How to add entry to your bookmark

Currently, it is not supported in this application. (I\'m so sorry…)\n To add entry to your bookmark, please install \'はてなブックマーク\' from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hatena.android.bookmark, then you can add bookmark from Browser -> Share -> \'ブックマークに登録\'.

I'm working hard to make this application more useful.
 This release is my first Android application, and I learned a lot from this one month developing.
 So, please stay tuned. I promise you to bring many useful features in coming future updates!
